executable.title: Generate Landmarks Model (BRAINS)
executable.description: Train up a model for BRAINSConstellationDetector

file.name: inputTrainingList
file.description: Setup file, giving all parameters for training up a template model for each landmark.

file.name: outputModel
file.description: The full filename of the output model file.

boolean.name: saveOptimizedLandmarks
boolean.label: saveOptimizedLandmarks
boolean.description: Flag to make a new subject-specific landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 with the optimized landmark (the detected RP, AC, and PC) in it. Useful to tighten the variances in the ConstellationModeler.

string.name: optimizedLandmarksFilenameExtender
string.description: If the trainingList is (indexFullPathName) and contains landmark data filenames [path]/[filename].fcsv , make the optimized landmarks filenames out of [path]/[filename](thisExtender) and the optimized version of the input trainingList out of (indexFullPathName)(thisExtender) , when you rewrite all the landmarks according to the saveOptimizedLandmarks flag.

directory.name: resultsDir
directory.label: resultsDir
directory.description: The directory for the results to be written.

integer.name: mspQualityLevel
integer.label: mspQualityLevel
integer.description: Flag cotrols how agressive the MSP is estimated. 0=quick estimate (9 seconds), 1=normal estimate (11 seconds), 2=great estimate (22 seconds), 3=best estimate (58 seconds).

boolean.name: rescaleIntensities
boolean.label: rescaleIntensities
boolean.description: Flag to turn on rescaling image intensities on input.

double.name: trimRescaledIntensities
double.label: trimRescaledIntensities
double.description: Turn on clipping the rescaled image one-tailed on input. Units of standard deviations above the mean. Very large values are very permissive. Non-positive value turns clipping off. Defaults to removing 0.00001 of a normal tail above the mean.

integer-vector.name: rescaleIntensitiesOutputRange
integer-vector.label: rescaleIntensitiesOutputRange
integer-vector.description: This pair of integers gives the lower and upper bounds on the signal portion of the output image. Out-of-field voxels are taken from BackgroundFillValue.

string.name: backgroundFillValueString
string.description: Fill the background of image with specified short int value. Enter number or use BIGNEG for a large negative number.
string.label: Background Fill Value

integer.name: writedebuggingImagesLevel
integer.label: writedebuggingImagesLevel
integer.description: This flag controls if debugging images are produced. By default value of 0 is no images. Anything greater than zero will be increasing level of debugging images.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
